title: Looking through glass
brief_description: A study of the manufacture of glass in a British factory, where the handcraftsman still applies his art alongside modern mass production methods. A sequence is devoted to a survey of the department of Glass Technology at Sheffield University.
description: A study of the manufacture of glass in a British factory, where the handcraftsman still applies his art alongside modern mass production methods. A sequence is devoted to a survey of the department of Glass Technology at Sheffield University.
